name: Maison Tresnuraghes

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had 2 nights here and can recommend. A quiet hotel with an enclosed garden. Our room was off the garden and was clean and comfortable. The only drawback was it had very little natural light so you wouldn't want to spend too much time indoors but why would you with such a good garden and roof terrace. Very pleasant and helpful staff and a great breakfast.
reviews.title: Pleasant Oasis

reviews.text: This hotel was a fantastic find, my husband & I stayed at Maison Tresnuraghes for 5 days in July & with all honesty the service is perfect.
reviews.title: Wonderful have never experienced such quality service elsewhere.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The lovely ladies who work there were so kind & helpful, the grounds & the rooms were beautiful.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: A Little Gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A big Grazie mille we had a wonderful time & will highly recommend you to everyone we know.
reviews.title: Lovely, restful, charming hotel

description: Maison Tresnuraghes is located in the historic centre of Tresnuraghes a small village on the north – west coast of Sardinia. It is a scattered hotel consisting of two aged houses superbly restored gathered around a large patio. A garden surroundly by walls protects the guests’ privacy. The eleven elegant bedrooms in grey and beige shades are large and bright. All of them have a private bathroom, TV, air conditioner, mini bar, internet access.
